title: Whenever I attempt to add an event to Google calendar I get "the requested event wasn't found"
content:
Hi,

I recently purchased a Google Pixel 3 device.
I'm having serious issues with syncing my Google Calendar and Google Keep notes.

In Google Calendar when I attempt to add an event I get a "the requested event wasn't found" error.
In Google Keep when I open the app it just shows an endless spinner.

When I open the "Accounts Sync" page I see that there is a message saying "Sync is currently experiencing problems, it will be back shortly", however this message is showing for 3 days now.

I tried pretty much everything:

* I've updated to the latest version of Android and installed all fixes.
* I tried deleting the cache and data of the Google Calendar and Google Keep apps
* I even tried to remove and re-add my Google Account.

Can someone please help me fix this?
I rely heavily on Calendar and Keep and my phone isn't usable to me without them.

Thanks,
Ido
